cs3744.hw1

Class HW1View

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.layout.Pane
            • javafx.scene.layout.GridPane
              • cs3744.hw1.HW1View
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class HW1View
extends javafx.scene.layout.GridPane
    Represents the view of the application. This view consists of a main color label at the top of the pane. At the bottom there are three ColorSlider elements. Each of which has two labels and a slider.
    Author:
    Elmer Landaverde
